empty.project-desc: There are no registered projects. Add a new one to start managing.
empty.project-org-desc: There are no registered projects for this organization.
empty.org-desc: There are no registered organizations. Add a new one to start managing.
empty.env-desc: There are no registered environments for this project.
empty.api-key-desc: There are no registered API keys. Add a new one to start managing.
empty.member-desc: There are no registered members. Invite a new one to start managing.
empty.notification-desc: There are no registered notifications. Add a new one to start managing.
empty.push-desc: There are no registered pushes. Add a new one to start managing.
empty.goal-desc: There are no registered goals. Add a new one to start managing.
empty.user-segments-desc: There are no registered user segments. Add a new one to start managing.
empty.feature-flags-desc: There are no registered feature flags. Add a new one to start managing.
empty.notifications: No notifications to show just yet, but don't worry, we're here to keep you in the loop.

organization.confirm-archive-desc: The organization "<bold>{{name}}</bold>" will be archived. Are you sure you want to proceed?
organization.confirm-unarchive-desc: The organization "<bold>{{name}}</bold>" will be unarchived. Are you sure you want to proceed?

environment.confirm-archive-desc: The environment "<bold>{{name}}</bold>" will be archived. Are you sure you want to proceed?
environment.confirm-unarchive-desc: The environment "<bold>{{name}}</bold>" will be unarchived. Are you sure you want to proceed?

members.delete-member-desc: The member "<bold>{{email}}</bold>" will be deleted permanently. Are you sure you want to proceed?
members.confirm-enable-desc: The member "<bold>{{email}}</bold>" will be enabled. Are you sure you want to proceed?
members.confirm-disable-desc: The member "<bold>{{email}}</bold>" will be disabled. Are you sure you want to proceed?

api-key.confirm-enable-desc: The API key "<bold>{{name}}</bold>" will be enabled. Are you sure you want to proceed?
api-key.confirm-disable-desc: The API key "<bold>{{name}}</bold>" will be disabled. Are you sure you want to proceed?

notification.confirm-enable-desc: The notification "<bold>{{name}}</bold>" will be enabled. Are you sure you want to proceed?
notification.confirm-disable-desc: The notification "<bold>{{name}}</bold>" will be disabled. Are you sure you want to proceed?

push.confirm-enable-desc: The Push "<bold>{{name}}</bold>" will be enabled. Are you sure you want to proceed?
push.confirm-disable-desc: The Push "<bold>{{name}}</bold>" will be disabled. Are you sure you want to proceed?

goals.delete-goal-desc: The goal "<bold>{{name}}</bold>" will be deleted permanently. Are you sure you want to proceed?
goals.confirm-archive-desc: This goal "<bold>{{name}}</bold>" will be archived and will only show on the list page when clicking on the Archived tab. Are you sure you want to proceed?
goals.confirm-unarchive-desc: The goal "<bold>{{name}}</bold>" will be unarchived. Are you sure you want to proceed?

user-segment.delete-user-segment-desc: The <bold>{{name}}</bold> is going to be deleted permanently. Are you sure you want to proceed?

feature-flags.confirm-archive-desc: This will archive and return the default value defined in your code for all users. We recommend removing the code references to "<text>{{name}}</text>" from your application before archiving.
feature-flags.confirm-unarchive-desc: Are you sure you want to unarchive the feature flag "<text>{{name}}</text>"?
feature-flags.archive-warning: It is receiving one more requests in the last <text>{{days}}.</text>
feature-flags.confirm-required-desc: This will make changes to the flag and increment the version.
feature-flags.default-rule-desc: When targeting is ON and contexts don't match any targeting rules
